2007c3b4-3865-41c8-a279-df881c368d39.description: Earner of Calypso Certified Back Office - Associate has completed Calypso Back Office Certification. The Certification validates individual/teams' understanding of Calypso’s Foundational Back Office components and how they can be configured to meet the need of various business users. This Certification validates the user’s knowledge about Calypso’s Back Office processes and their execution in Calypso.
2007c3b4-3865-41c8-a279-df881c368d39.name: Calypso Certified Back Office - Associate (V16.1)

badge_template_activities.title: To earn Calypso Certified Back Office - Associate badge, the learner needs to acquire 20 credits from Foundation level courses identified by Calypso
To earn Calypso Certified Back Office - Associate badge, the learner needs to have Calypso experience of 6 months or above

59294e67-f4c7-4531-9156-47517b1905ff.description: Earner of Calypso Certified Front Office - Associate has completed Calypso Front Office Certification. The Certification validates front office users' Foundational understanding of Calypso’s Front-Office platform and the tools available for day-to-day front office activities and hands-on experience about the processes which are necessary to integrate their Trading, Position/Portfolio, and Risk Management with and in Calypso.
